name: Datanyze
description: Maximize account-based engagement with Datanyze data in all your tools

private_settings.name: token
private_settings.title: Datanyze API Token
private_settings.description: You can find your personal API Token at https://www.datanyze.com/settings/?tab=api

private_settings.name: enrich_hero
private_settings.title: Enrichment
private_settings.description: Enhance user profiles with Datanyze technographic and firmographic data points.

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Enrich users belonging to one of these segments
private_settings.description:
The above list of segments is a whitelist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which enrichment shall be performed.
If you do not specify any segment, no user will be sent to the Datanyze API.

private_settings.name: target_trait
private_settings.title: Attribute that defines the company domain
private_settings.description: The connector will use the value of this attribute as domain when fetching people from Datanyze.

private_settings.name: excluded_domains
private_settings.title: Excluded the following domains from Enrichment
private_settings.description: Please specify domain values as comma-separated list. The above list of domains is a blacklist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more domains* for which enrichment shall be skipped. If you do not specify any domain, the connector will perform a call to the Datanyze API for every user matching one of the whitelisted segments. Please note that each call will count towards your monthly rate limit.

private_settings.name: handle_accounts
private_settings.title: Handle Accounts
private_settings.description: If active, Data will be written at Account level. The Account Domain field will be used to query Datanyze
